title: Future Studies
content:
I'm currently in 6th sem CS and my parents are forcing me to prepare for MS abroad . I have a pretty average cgpa (less chance of acceptance and scholarship) and kinda worried about investing a huge sum on it. 
So I started researching about GATE and wanted to know  about any personal experience or journeys of any seniors you wrote GATE or pursuing M.Tech in any IITs/NITs.
Are M.Tech (CS) worth these days , I was reading a lot of negative reviews on them (Average placements, huge partiality between B.Tech and M.Tech students).
It would be great for suggestions on what I should pursue (MS abroad or M.Tech in India) .
I also want to live the "college life" , after spending more than 3.5 sems online I really haven't experienced the college life about what I have heard or seen from my other college friends .
Thanks in advance.

comments.body: My batch had 4.5 online semesters. Everything after 3rd sem is a blur lol
pain but you saved time by not travelling
